<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaskPosOpt = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpintrinsic/#a15c8605718d066667e36c9dc890ad40a">VPIntrinsic::getMaskParamPos</a>(VPID);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VLenPosOpt = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpintrinsic/#a88782f243be6d837a183d7abfe7b1a3c">VPIntrinsic::getVectorLengthParamPos</a>(VPID);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumInstParams = InstOpArray.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumVPParams =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumInstParams + MaskPosOpt.has&#95;value() + VLenPosOpt.has&#95;value();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 6&gt;</a> IntrinParams;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether the mask and vlen parameter are at the end of the parameter list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TrailingMaskAndVLen =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::min&lt;size&#95;t&gt;(MaskPosOpt.value&#95;or(NumInstParams),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">                       VLenPosOpt.value&#95;or(NumInstParams)) &gt;= NumInstParams;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TrailingMaskAndVLen) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fast path for trailing mask, vector length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    IntrinParams.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a7efd1f0c1206d95e4fe01a9b49a57b82">append</a>(InstOpArray.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>(), InstOpArray.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a7ca5197533a9c1fb8a2bd30587fcec6b">end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    IntrinParams.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#ad0b3d8447f88377b62d9c019f3c4e118">resize</a>(NumVPParams);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    IntrinParams.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#ad0b3d8447f88377b62d9c019f3c4e118">resize</a>(NumVPParams);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert mask and evl operands in between the instruction operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VPParamIdx = 0, ParamIdx = 0; VPParamIdx &lt; NumVPParams;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">         ++VPParamIdx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaskPosOpt == VPParamIdx || VLenPosOpt == VPParamIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ParamIdx &lt; NumInstParams);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      IntrinParams&#91;VPParamIdx&#93; = InstOpArray&#91;ParamIdx++&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaskPosOpt)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    IntrinParams&#91;&#42;MaskPosOpt&#93; = &amp;requestMask();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VLenPosOpt)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    IntrinParams&#91;&#42;VLenPosOpt&#93; = &amp;requestEVL();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;VPDecl = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpintrinsic/#abcfa2b533145fedf69b3e10bc2a30fb6">VPIntrinsic::getOrInsertDeclarationForParams</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectorbuilder/#aaace90f0127502bf323cad27e83fab11">getModule</a>(), VPID, ReturnTy, IntrinParams);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Builder.CreateCall(VPDecl, IntrinParams, Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
